greeting: .. *Sigh*, thank the heavens that you a Warrior! Came to our resque. This will give the Towns people som safety
Great we really need an Mage to take down those pesky flying things! Just don't die on us too fast, these monsters are Nasty
Wow! An archer! I don't know if i should worry or be thankfull! The last Archer almost wiped out our city when he sneezed...
A Munk! Are you shure you'r up for this?? Didn't think "Holy People" did much figthing..
*Yikes!!* A Farmer!! What is the king thinking sending YOU of all people, times must really be dire...
